code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl="http://localhost:3001/posts";var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl);};var create=function create(newPost){return axios.post(baseUrl,newPost);};var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));};var update=function update(id,changedPost){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),changedPost);};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,deletePost:deletePost,update:update};
